channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Empowering every developer with trusted Microsoft insights

item.title: 【Customer Case Story: Creating a Semantic Kernel Agent for Automated GitHub Code Reviews】客户案例故事：为自动化GitHub代码评论创建语义内核代理
item.description: 【Today I want to welcome a guest author to our Semantic Kernel blog, Rasmus Wulff Jensen, to cover how he’s created a Semantic Kernel agent for automated GitHub code review. We’ll turn it over to Rasmus to dive in. Introduction If you work in software development, you know that Code reviews are an essential part […]】今天，我想欢迎一位来宾作者进入我们的语义内核博客Rasmus Wulff Jensen，以介绍他如何为自动化GitHub代码评论创建语义内核代理。我们将其移交给Rasmus进行潜水。简介您在软件开发中工作，您知道代码评论是必不可少的部分[…]

item.title: 【Microsoft 365 Certification control spotlight: Data in transit】Microsoft 365认证控制聚光灯：运输中的数据
item.description: 【Ensure your Microsoft Teams app, Microsoft 365 add-in, or agent meets the latest compliance standards with Microsoft 365 Certification.】确保您的Microsoft Teams应用程序，Microsoft 365加载项或代理商符合Microsoft 365认证的最新合规性标准。

item.title: 【Markdown for large text fields (private preview)】大型文本字段的宣传（私人预览）
item.description: 【Adding Markdown capabilities to the work item is a long-standing request. We introduced Markdown for comments in early 2024, but due to the rollout of the New Boards Hub, we put the feature on hold. Today, we’re excited to announce a private preview for Markdown support in large text fields! 🎉 🦄 How it works […]】在工作项目中添加降价功能是一个长期的请求。我们在2024年初介绍了评论的Markdown，但是由于新董事会集线器的推出，我们暂停了该功能。今天，我们很高兴宣布在大型文本字段中进行销售支持的私人预览！ 🎉🦄如何工作[…]

item.title: 【Flexible Tool Selection for ML Model Production】ML模型生产的灵活工具选择
item.description: 【data science and software engineering teams can choose the best tools for their respective roles in delivering machine learning models to production.】数据科学和软件工程团队可以为其在将机器学习模型传递到生产中的各自角色中选择最佳工具。

item.title: 【Making sure that a DLL loads only from your application directory】确保DLL仅从您的应用程序目录加载
item.description: 【You can ask for it as an option, but think about what you're actually protecting against.】您可以将其作为一种选择，但请考虑一下您实际保护的东西。

item.title: 【Using Azure AI Agents with Semantic Kernel in .NET and Python】在.NET和Python中使用具有语义内核的Azure AI代理
item.description: 【Today we’re excited to dive into Semantic Kernel and Azure AI Agents. There are additional details about using an AzureAIAgent within Semantic Kernel covered in our documentation here. Azure AI Agents are powerful tools for developers seeking to integrate AI capabilities into their applications. In this blog post, we’ll explore how to utilize Azure AI […]】今天，我们很高兴潜入语义内核和Azure AI代理。还有有关在我们的文档中介绍的语义内核中使用AzureAiagent的其他详细信息。 Azure AI代理是寻求将AI功能集成到其应用程序的开发人员的强大工具。在此博客文章中，我们将探讨如何利用Azure AI […]

item.title: 【DirectX at GDC 2025】DirectX在GDC 2025
item.description: 【We’re counting down the days until the Microsoft DirectX team will be at the Game Developers Conference 2025 with a lineup of exciting sessions and announcements to push the boundaries of game development. Whether you’re a seasoned graphics developer or just diving into the world of DirectX, our sessions will offer valuable insights into the […]】我们正在倒数日子，直到Microsoft DirectX团队将参加2025年游戏开发人员会议，并进行了一系列令人兴奋的会议和公告，以突破游戏开发的界限。无论您是经验丰富的图形开发人员还是只是潜入DirectX世界，我们的会议都会为[…]提供宝贵的见解。

item.title: 【The Future of AI: Customizing AI Agents with the Semantic Kernel Agent Framework】AI的未来：使用语义内核代理框架自定义AI代理
item.description: 【Today we’re excited to promote a recent blog from AI Platform focused on customizing AI agents with the Semantic Kernel agent framework. Read the entire blog post: here The Future of AI blog series is an evolving collection of posts from the AI Futures team in collaboration with subject matter experts across Microsoft. In this […]】今天，我们很高兴推广来自AI平台的最新博客，该博客致力于使用语义内核代理框架自定义AI代理。阅读整个博客文章：在这里，AI博客系列的未来是与Microsoft的主题专家合作的AI期货团队不断发展的帖子集合。在这个[…]

item.title: 【Introducing support for SLNX, a new, simpler solution file format in the .NET CLI】引入对SLNX的支持，SLNX是.NET CLI中的一种新的，简单的解决方案文件格式
item.description: 【Learn about the .NET CLI's ability to interact with the new XML-based solution file format.】了解.NET CLI与新的基于XML的解决方案文件格式进行交互的能力。

item.title: 【New, Simpler Solution File Format】新的，更简单的解决方案文件格式
item.description: 【For years, you’ve worked with Visual Studio’s solution file (*.SLN) format, and while it’s a core part of your project organization, we know the experience hasn’t always been smooth. Whether you’ve been modifying, maintaining, or trying to resolve merge conflicts, it’s often felt more like a hassle than it should be. We understand your frustrations, […]】多年来，您一直使用Visual Studio的解决方案文件（*.SLN）格式，尽管它是项目组织的核心部分，但我们知道体验并不总是很顺利。无论您是在修改，维护还是试图解决合并冲突，通常都会比这更像是麻烦。我们了解您的挫败感，[…]
